code: import img1 from'../assets/1.png';import img2 from'../assets/2.png';import img3 from'../assets/3.png';import img4 from'../assets/5.png';import img5 from'../assets/6.png';var products=[{id:1,pictureUrl:"".concat(img1),category:'tortas',title:'Lemon Pie',description:'Lemon pie',price:100,stock:1},{id:2,pictureUrl:"".concat(img2),category:'tortas',title:'Brownie',description:'Brownie',price:100,stock:1},{id:3,pictureUrl:"".concat(img3),category:'tortas',title:'Tarta',description:'Tarta de frutos',price:100,stock:1},{id:4,pictureUrl:"".concat(img4),category:'galletitas',title:'Galletitas',description:'Pepas',price:100,stock:1},{id:5,pictureUrl:"".concat(img5),category:'alfajores',title:'Alfajores',description:'Alfajores de coco con dulce de leche',price:100,stock:1}];export var getAllProducts=function getAllProducts(){var promise=new Promise(function(resolve){setTimeout(function(){return resolve(products);},2000);});return promise;};export var getProduct=function getProduct(id){var promise=new Promise(function(resolve){var result=products.find(function(product){return product.id===parseInt(id);});setTimeout(function(){return resolve(result);},2000);});return promise;};export var getProductsByCategory=function getProductsByCategory(categoryId){var promise=new Promise(function(resolve){var results=products.filter(function(product){return product.category===categoryId;});setTimeout(function(){return resolve(results);},2000);});return promise;};
